values.API.GEXPlayer: Zaktualizowano ranking graczy w wyprawie gildyjnej
values.API.LGInvest: Przesłano Twoje wpłaty w perły architektury
values.Boxes.Alerts.Form.Persistence.Descriptio: Should the notification remain open until the user dismisses or clicks the notification
values.Boxes.Alerts.Form.Tag.Description: Tags can be used to group notifications (a new notification with a given tag will replace an older notification with the same tag)
values.Boxes.Alerts.Form.Title: Title
values.Boxes.Alerts.Permissions.Default: Enable notifications in your browser to use this feature
values.Boxes.Alerts.Permissions.Denied: Notifications have been disabled. To enable notifications in your browser settings navigate to chrome://settings/content/notifications and then refresh this page.
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Auction.Info: Automatically create a new alert when I make a bid in the Antiques Dealer Auction
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Auction.Title: Antiques Dealer Auction
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Battlegrounds.I: Send an instant alert when there is a high activity in the Guild Battlegrounds (for example, 10 fights in a single sector within 5 seconds). Please note that this function works only when the Guild Battlegrounds are open in game!
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Early.Info: Automatically generated alert times (Antiques Dealer, Guild Battlegrounds etc) will use this offset to send notification before the event actually happens. For example, setting this value to 30 (seconds), Auction alerts will be displayed 30s before the auction actually ends!
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Early.Title: Notify Early Offset
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.InGame.Info: Show in-game notification instead of the native Desktop notification when the game window is focused
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.InGame.Title: In-game Notifications
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.MenuIcon.Info: Show the next alert countdown as an overlay of the Main Menu icon
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.MenuIcon.Title: Main Menu Countdown
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Start.Info: Display a list of Alerts which expired while offline (since the game window was closed)
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Start.Title: Expired Alert Summary at Start
values.Boxes.Alerts.Preferences.Suggestions.Inf: Display alert suggestions (for example, when clicking on a Battleground sector, or collecting a building production)
values.Boxes.Api.Title: Ustawienia API rozszerzenia
values.Boxes.BattleAssist.Text: Twoja armia składa się z samych łotrów. Wylecz jednostki z użyciem diamentów lub poddaj się!

values.Boxes.Calculator.LGNotConnected: Perła nie jest podłączona do drogi

values.Boxes.Calculator.Title: Kalkulator kosztów
values.Boxes.Calculator.TTForderFPStockLow:
UWAGA: posiadasz za mało PR
masz __fpstock__ z __costs__ PR
za mało o __tooless__ PR
values.Boxes.Calculator.TTForderNegativeProfit:
Miejsce nie jest zabezpieczone. należy wpłacić __fpcount__ dodatkowych PR w celu zabezpieczenia
Całkowita wpłata: __totalfp__ PR
values.Boxes.Calculator.TTLevelWarning:
__fpcount__ PR nie zmieści się
Maksymalna możliwa wpłata: __totalfp__ PR
values.Boxes.Calculator.TTLoss:
Reward = __nettoreward__ (Net Reward) X __arcfactor__% (Arc Bonus) = __bruttoreward__
Cost: __costs__ - Place locked at: __safe__
Loss = __costs__ (Cost) - __bruttoreward__ (Reward) = __loss__
values.Boxes.Calculator.TTPaidTooLess: Wpłaciłeś __paid__ PR zamiast __topay__ PR, tzn. __tooless__ PR za mało.
values.Boxes.Calculator.TTPaidTooMuch: Wpłaciłeś __paid__ PR zamiast __topay__ PR, tzn. __toomuch__ PR za dużo.
values.Boxes.Calculator.TTProfit:
Reward = __nettoreward__ (Net Reward) X __arcfactor__% (Arc Bonus) = __bruttoreward__
Cost: __costs__ - Place locked at: __safe__
Profit = __bruttoreward__ (Reward) - __costs__ (Cost) = __profit__

values.Settings.GlobalSend.Desc:
Jeżeli chcesz śledzić postępy wewnątrz swojej gildii możesz aktywować to zaznaczenie.
Dla samodzielnego rozszerzenia możesz odznaczyć wybór.

values.Settings.Help.Desc: There are several ways to get support:
values.Settings.Help.Discord: Discord: join our server for general discussions about the extension, chats and support.
values.Settings.Help.Forums: Forums: go here for support and submitting ideas, aswell as bug reports.
values.Settings.Help.Github: GitHub: for more technical bug reports, concrete ideas and helping with development.
values.Settings.Help.Title: Help and Community
values.Settings.Help.Website: Website: information on the extension and a documentation of it's features.
values.Settings.MenuLength.Desc:
Ile elementów powinno mieścic menu rozszerzenia?
Puste lub "0" oznacza automatyczną wysokość.
